description: This file defines the AppointmentModel class for managing appointment data in a healthcare appointment management system. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting appointments, utilizing database queries with SQL and external database configuration.

classes.name: AppointmentModel
classes.description: Model class for handling appointment-related database operations.

methods.name: create({ patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_time, reason })
methods.description: Creates a new appointment record in the database with specified details and returns the created appointment.

methods.name: findById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves an appointment by its ID, including related patient and doctor names.

methods.name: list({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Returns a list of appointments filtered by optional doctor ID, patient ID, date range, with pagination support.

methods.name: update(id, fields)
methods.description: Updates specified fields of an existing appointment identified by ID.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes an appointment from the database by its ID.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^  static async create({ patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_time, reason }) {$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^  static async list({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {}) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ doctorId, patientId, start, end, limit = 100, offset = 0 } = {})
